content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_boots
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 17, "index": 15}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 56, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 16, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 21, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 11, "index": 35}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 36, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 24, "index": 40}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft iron boots, I need to place an iron ingot in the top left corner of the crafting grid, and then place two more ingots below it. The first step is to move one of the ingots from slot 45 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_boots
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 17, "index": 15}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 56, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 16, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 21, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 11, "index": 35}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 36, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 24, "index": 40}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 45}]
thought: I've moved one ingot to the top left corner, so now I need to move another one below it. I'll move it from slot 45 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 3 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 45 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 10}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 12}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 17, "index": 15}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 56, "index": 16}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 18}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 2, "index": 19}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 36, "index": 24}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 16, "index": 25}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 21, "index": 30}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 11, "index": 35}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 36, "index": 36}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 10, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 24, "index": 40}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
